borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) of permission ref: 2021/04098/VLBC granted 7th April 2022 for the 'Variation of Condition 2 (approved drawings) to allow minor material amendments to listed building consent reference: 2020/02025/LBC dated 17th March 2021 for the "Alterations and extensions to the Grade II listed building including the demolition of the summer house, erection of a part-one, part-two and part-three storey extension and excavation of a basement beneath the extension, in connection with the use of the site as a 32-bedroom nursing home (Use Class C2) together with the demolition and replacement of front and side boundary walls, and means of access to the highway on Daisy Lane." Amendments sought are the repositioning of access hatches to roof of rear extension; and internal boarding of two windows in internal hall and WC access to main building to comply with Building Regulations.' Amendments to include 'Ground Floor: change to entrance door of the new reception, addition of firefighting riser to north elevations of the extension, change to bin store; First Floor: off setting of Bed 25 door to ensuite, lift shaft to be made of brick work as opposed to timber stood, and retention of Bed 24 wall; Second Floor: alterations to roof terrace coping stone; Boundary Wall: alterations to boundary gates; North Elevations & Sections: minor change to pre-cast panels, and fire riser, door and coping stone picked up; Brickwork: brick protrudes have been reduced to 15mm.
